thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 14 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Creval to offer new shares in cash call at 0.10 euros each

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Creval to offer new shares in cash call at 0.10 euros each
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Italian regional lender Creval says:
* TO OFFER SHARES IN CAPITAL INCREASE AT AROUND 16 PERCENT DISCOUNT TO THEORETICAL EX-RIGHTS PRICE (TERP)
* TO OFFER NEW SHARES AT 0.1 EUROS EACH * TO OFFER 631 NEWLY ISSUED SHARES FOR EVERY SHARE ALREADY OWNED
* SHARE OFFER FROM FEB. 19 TO MARCH 8, SUBSCRIPTION RIGHTS CAN BE TRADED UNTIL MARCH 2 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reporting by Milan newsroom)
